bio:
Hired Thug is an Imperial man who is hostile to the player. The player recently stole something, and the victim of this theft responded by hiring by hiring a group of three thugs to find the player and punish them for their crime. This thug is a member of this contracted group.
They carry a contract, signed by their employer. While the contract says that they are not necessarily obligated to kill the player (only that they must teach them a lesson), these hired thugs will attempt to kill the player regardless.
The three thugs are exclusively close-range fighters, and wear high-quality heavy armor. They are also equipped with a high-quality dagger, shield, and weapon (either a sword, axe, mace, or war hammer).
Hired thugs tend to approach the player when no town guards are nearby, in order to reduce the chance of complications during the encounter.
Quotes:
"This'll teach you not to take things that don't belong to you!"
name: Hired Thug
